channel.title: [317] Barrows Items [317]
channel.description:
How can i stop barrows items degrading when dropped?
On my 317, if you drop a piece of barrows it becomes degraded and you have to repair it... how do i remove degrading barrows? :confused:

item.title: [317] Barrows Items [317]
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

This will be in your dropping items method, Just look for it in client.java look for item id of barrows before degrade and after. then just remove it. do it for all of the barrows items

Read full topic
